message: Starting work on week6.json explanations. Reading reference format and current week6.json content.
Week6.json analysis complete: ALL 45 questions ALREADY have complete per-choice explanations matching the required format. Performing 5-Second Quality Rule verification.

COMPLETED: Week6.json verified complete with 45 quiz questions, all having proper per-choice explanations. Format: correct (30-60 words) + incorrect per-choice (20-40 words). All explanations cite concepts/researchers (Ehrenfels, Gregory, Gibson, Macknik & Martinez-Conde), explain WHY not just WHAT, and pass 5-Second Quality Rule. Topics covered: Perception Fundamentals (10Q), Gestalt Principles (15Q), Depth Perception (15Q), Theories of Visual Perception (15Q). No changes needed - file already meets all requirements. File: study-site/src/data/weeks/week6.json (1313 lines).
